Name: connamespace
Description: the oid of the namespace that contains this constraint

Name: contype
Description: c = check constraint, f = foreign key constraint, p = primary key constraint, u = unique constraint

Name: condeferred
Description: is the constraint deferred by default?

Name: conrelid
Description: the table this constraint is on; 0 if not a table constraint

Name: contypid
Description: the domain this constraint is on; 0 if not a domain constraint

Name: confrelid
Description: if a foreign key, the referenced table; else 0

Name: conkey
Description: if a table constraint, list of columns which the constraint constrains

Name: confkey
Description: if a foreign key, list of the referenced columns

Name: conpfeqop
Description: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for pk = fk comparisons

Name: conppeqop
Description: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for pk = pk comparisons

Name: conffeqop
Description: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for fk = fk comparisons

Name: conbin
Description: if a check constraint, an internal representation of the expression

Name: consrc
Description: if a check constraint, a human-readable representation of the expression
